name: Soviet Union
declaringWar: Your Governement did a lot against us and our peoples!
attacked: You dont realise what mistake you done...
defeated: We lost.But not our peoples morale.
introduction: Hello, if you not going to atack Soviet Union or our peoples then we might be allies
hateHello: We will defend from your agression at all costs if you atack.
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
